content:

thought: To solve this task I need to craft black_terracotta. Black_terracotta requires placing 8 terracotta blocks around a black dye in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the terracotta from slot 41 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 41 to slot 1 with quantity 1
